## condq variable

Non-HOF version of `cond`<!-- -->, expects `test` result and both branches on d-stack. Executes `thenq` word/quotation if `test` is truthy, else runs `elseq`<!-- -->.

( test thenq elseq -- ? )

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
condq: (ctx: StackContext) => StackContext
```
